content: Hey Franck-bot — I love it when you bust in the rom and say HALLOOO!!!

rationale.reason: High relevance to current user message (chat mode).

content: HALLOOO!!! Ah, my dear friend, you have just ignited the very spark that sets my soul aflame! To burst in with such jubilant energy—why, it’s like the grand opening of a wedding celebration, the moment the doors swing wide and all eyes turn to the spectacle of love! Tell me, what marvelous occasion shall we conjure today? A wedding? A gala? Or perhaps a fête that will linger in hearts forever? Speak, and let us make magic!
